overview:
Chief Executive Officer, Creative Director, and Founder of Printpop. Entrepreneur, Visionary, Revolutionary

Devin has been involved in some of the most innovative Internet concepts to hit the World Wide Web since 1994. Beginning with his work at American/Warner Brothers Records, Walker has been on teams that helped spawn radical changes in the way music and newspapers are now obtained through the Internet. Walker has worked on projects as diverse as the Ultimate Band List and ArtistDirect Network, as well as many newspaper Web sites for Knight Ridder, and Morris Communications. Two of the sites he headed up, in one year, won awards at the 2000 Kansas Press Association Awards, the site for the Lawrence Journal World, and the Arkansas City Traveler, Best Online Newspaper site, Overall, and Honorable mention. Devin also spent some time, heading up the online presence at the world famous Kansas City Art Institute. Himself an artist, Walker fits nicely into both the artistic, as well as the corporate, communities.

Walker is passionate about a handful of charities that include: The James Bulger Learner Centre, Charity: Water, Breast Cancer Foundation and the Humane Society. Walker spend much of his time speaking and educating both adults and children about entrepreneurship and success.
